title: MSB3277: Found conflicts between different versions of the same dependent assembly is not going away after app.config update
body:
Even after I update app.config to have assembly redirect this warning is not going away. I can't make dependent references to use same version so I need redirection to work. There is no problem at runtime though. Warnings are considered as error and blocking my commit. Appreciate any inputs to resolve. 

app.config:
      <dependentAssembly>
        <assemblyIdentity name="Microsoft.Cloud.InstrumentationFramework.Metrics" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" culture="neutral" />
        <bindingRedirect oldVersion="0.0.0.0-3.1.0.0" newVersion="3.0.0.0" />
      </dependentAssembly>

build log:
5>      "Microsoft.Cloud.InstrumentationFramework.Metrics, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35" was chosen because it was primary and "Microsoft.Cloud.InstrumentationFramework.Metrics, Version=3.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35" was not.
5>      References which depend on "Microsoft.Cloud.InstrumentationFramework.Metrics, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35" [d:\corextcache\Microsoft.Cloud.InstrumentationFramework.3.0.8.0\lib\net40\Microsoft.Cloud.InstrumentationFramework.Metrics.dll].
